clean_data: Service Now DeveloperAdmin Service Now span  Service Now DeveloperAdmin CVS Pharmacy Mount Prospect IL Overall 8 Years of IT experience in Software Design Development Analysis Testing including 4 years of Implementation experience in ServiceNow platform as both Developer and Administrator Experience in Configuring Applications using ServiceNow used in ITIL Management Good Knowledge on Software Development Life Cycle SDLC Scrum and Agile process models Design and engineer solutions leveraging all appropriate components offered by ServiceNow to meet the needs for business workflows ticketing or other ITService Management and ITAsset Management requirements Configuration of Inbound and Outbound Web Services over REST and SOAP Experience on working with ServiceNow Incident Change Problem Release Demand and Knowledge management Applications Configuring and developing Service Catalogs with various business process workflows Configuration of Service level Agreements SLAOLA for various taskbased applications like Incident problem catalogs Good knowledge on ServiceNow IT Operations Management ITOM Applications Event Management and Discovery Experience working with email notifications inbound actions reports Experience in creating homepages and dashboards for stake holders Experience in generating reports per requirements and also publishing reports on the Homepages and dashboards as required Involved with ServiceNow Performance analytics dashboard and reporting Configuring and managing Configuration Management CMDB Experience in configuring ServiceNow integration with lightweight Directory Access Protocol LDAP JIRA and Single signon SSO Developed various configurations and business requirements using ServiceNow Server side scripting Business Rules Script Includes UI Actions and Clientside scripting Client Scripts UI Policies UI Pages and Widgets Configured multiple Access control list ACL for tables and views based on access and security requirements Experience in designing User Interface UI applications and web applications using HTML 405 XHTML CSS2CSS3 JAVASCRIPT JQUERY AJAX JSON and XML Good working knowledge in version control tools like Sub Version SVN CVS and Rational Clear Case and application testing using JUNIT Good experience in writing SQL Queries PLSQL Procedures Functions Triggers and Views Developed Maven and ANT scripts in to build and deploy J2EE Applications Motivated team player and selfstarter with ability to work under minimal supervision possessing strong analytical problem solving and communicational skills Work Experience Service Now DeveloperAdmin CVS Pharmacy Chicago IL July 2018 to Present Responsibilities Communicating with end users to identify their difficulties and enhancing the applications as per requirements Involved in implementing ServiceNow ITSM Applications Design and develop SLAs for the incident problem change management processes as per the requirement Involved in ServiceNow Administration Worked on creating various catalog items with associated workflows and configured Client Scripts UI policies including advanced customizations as needed Implementation of different Applications Modules Tables and Views as per clients requirement Created Order Guides for New Employee and Contractor On boarding Terminating Employee and Transfer of Employees Created Business Rules Client Scripts associated Script Includes to support development Designed Workflows along with standard Workflow templates which can be reused Involved in CMDB Deployment Plan to organize the implementation of data model Plan Designed the CMDB integration which captures all the inputs to CMDB originating from outside of the ServiceNow cloud platform and building the data sources to fit together Integrated Microsoft SCCM with ServiceNow for pulling the entire configuration item into ServiceNow Configuring Data sources and transform maps for CMDB Built Citrix integration to load virtual and desktop groups into CMDB tables Involved in LDAP integration to pull assignment group and users into ServiceNow Worked on ACLs including creating new roles and moving them to next instances Responsible for creating homepages including basic reporting gauge configuration and dash board presentation Created scheduled jobs scheduled reports and scheduled workflows Worked on developing and promoting scoped applications Troubleshooting access issues within scoped applications Worked on Survey Management and trigger conditions Create templates for request and approval notifications Troubleshooting production issues Appam Migration to ServiceNow to createremove CMDB relationships between Configuration Items and Business Applications Involved in preparing implementation plan for every release in ServiceNow and presented to entire team to execute the steps Used REST API to populate Contracts and Suppliers from Salesforce using properties and serverside scripts Experience on Credential Management Built CyberArk integration from scratch to store orchestration and discovery credentials externally to ServiceNow Involved in daily weekly and monthly meetings with client on the work progress and discussions on the upcoming work Used Automated testing frameworks to test development Responsible for creating documentation on developed integrations Involved in moving update sets from instance to instance including testing the changes Experience on scheduling upgrades clones and patches Created HI tickets with ServiceNow support to address issues Service Now DeveloperAdmin GE Transportation Atlanta GA September 2017 to July 2018 Responsibilities Configured and customized Service Catalogs Incident Change problem and knowledge management applications Involved in gathering requirements from stakeholders to leverage ServiceNow within organization on end user selfenablement portal using CMS Understanding technical and functional design requirements for workflow engines Created workflow and web prototypes Maintained and administered the implemented instance of ServiceNow and performed tasks such as configuring users company site location and other existing fields support groups assignment rules categorizations CI data SLA etc Worked on end to end implementation of CMDB module using Discovery tool Involved in developing and customization of Service Now plugins CMDB Technical support duties Worked on Configuring the IP Addresses to identify the undiscovered Configuration Item CIs and inserts them into CMDB Worked across IT and other operations divisions to design develop and implement ServiceNow solutions consistent with customer requirements Involved in configuring the UI Actions UI Policies ClientSide scripting and ServerSide scripting Working knowledge on Single Sign On SSO and eventbased integrations Worked on loading transforming and maintaining data between ServiceNow and other systems Worked with IT managers to generate views and reports Provide training sessions on ticketing tools reporting and data entry Enhanced the existing LDAP integration and modified business rules Worked in an agile environment and implemented the changes required by the business owners on a regular basis Expertise knowledge in creating custom workflows using Workflow activities and Sub flows for the service catalog items Involved in instance upgrade activities Recommended best practice in migrating Update sets to different instances and published a knowledge article on the same Service Now Developer Admin Hilton World Wide Memphis TN September 2015 to August 2017 Responsibilities Involved in creation of Functional and Technical Design Documents as per the requirements from the business team Involved in requirement gathering sessions Involved in creation of ServiceNow Applications Modules and Tables as per requirements Involved in customization of forms for various ServiceNow applications Involved in creation and configuration of business rules client scripts as per the required functionality Involved in setting up the SLA as per the requirements Involved in cloning activities Manage development of solutions to migrate andor integrate disparate data to an enterprise CMDB solution Involved in redesigning the workflows using ServiceNow workflow editor Involved in reconciliation of complicated workflows to simpler form Developed Service catalog by creating new Catalog items Designing workflows and Execution plans Created Outbound Email Notifications using Email Templates Integrated Service Now with internal applications through Inbound Email Actions Created various Script Includes and UI Scripts Created various Client Scripts which utilized GlideAjax API to invoke Script Includes Involved in LDAP integration with ServiceNow for obtaining users and groups Created Record Producers Order Guides and Catalog Client Scripts and Work flows Involved in the ServiceNow Instance upgrade activities Involved in cloning between various environments in ServiceNow Involved in loading of data into CMDB using discovery and file imports JavaJ2EE Developer Infinite Computer Solutions IN September 2013 to August 2015 Responsibilities Involved in Presentation Tier Development using JSF Framework and ICE Faces tag Libraries Implemented J2EE standards MVC2 architecture and used JavaScript and JQuery for front end validations Experience using ICE Faces Tag Libraries to develop user interface components Used JSF JSP Java Script HTML and CSS for manipulating validating customizing error messages to the User Interface Used EJBs Session beans to implement the business logic JMS for communication for sending updates to various other applications and MDB for routing priority requests All the Business logic in all the modules is written in core Java Wrote WebServices using SOAP for sending and getting data from the external interface Developed a webbased reporting for monitoring system with HTML and Tiles using Struts framework Involved in writing JMS Publishers to post messages and MDB Message Driven Beans as subscribers Created Stored procedures using PLSQL for data modification Using DML insert update delete in Oracle Interaction with Oracle database is implemented using Hibernate Front End Web Developer Qualcomm Pvt ltd June 2011 to September 2013 Responsibilities Understanding clients business requirements and participating in client meetings for designing and developing userfriendly front end customer facing product site using technologies such as HTML5 CSS3 AJAX XHTML JavaScript Used JQuery to traverse through a DOM tree and manipulated the nodes in the tree Implemented the Drag and Drop functionality using JQuery framework Created different Carousels using jQuery Carousel and Accordions with the help of jQuery UI for different product categories Involved in building highly interactive portable widgets using HTML5 CSS3 and the latest AJAX libraries Involved in Enhancement of existing application utilizing AngularJS created HTML navigation menu Created AngularJS Controller which Isolate scopes perform operations in UI Using AngularJS created custom directives for data manipulations and to display data in company standard format in UI Developed detailed mockups prototypes and wireframes to illustrate interface and design concepts of the website using Microsoft Visio Applied Use Cases diagram to validate and test web application design against the UI architecture Used detailed Wireframes and developed Mockup designs as per the requirements of Business Extensively used JQUERY XML AJAX and DOM scripting to create interactive web applications like message posting and auto complete form validations Participated in making Responsive Web Designs using Media Queries and Twitter Bootstrap Designed pages using AngularJS Forms Validations Modules Events and Expressions Directive Controllers filters and Http Request Responsible for setting up AngularJS framework to achieve data binding between HTML and JavaScript objects Worked on CrossBrowser compatibility and fixed the bugs for several browsers Worked closely with QA team and fixed QA bugs as well as production issues with a quick turnaround time Education Masters in Computer Science in Computer Science Texas AM University Skills Visual studio Android studio C C Git Html Javascript Subversion Xml Xsl Xslt Eclipse J2ee Java Jax Jaxws Jakarta Database Sql server Sql server 2008 Additional Information TECHNICAL
